definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: The sole redeeming feature of this job is the salary.
sentences.chinese: 這份工作唯其薪水尚可彌補一切之不足。

sentences.english: Thee sole redeeming feature of this job is the salary.
sentences.chinese: 這份工作唯其薪水尚可彌補一切之不足。

sentences.english: Result Knowledge of hand hygiene of medical personnel was adequate, but the implementation rate of hand-washing was low.
sentences.chinese: 結果醫務人員手衛生知識掌握尚可，但洗手執行率低。

sentences.english: Mr Shankman, who racks up 200,000 miles a year, suggests a number of ploys .
sentences.chinese: 每年旅行20萬英里的尚可曼給出了大量建議。

sentences.english: Pre-owned cars that are only a few years old with low mileage are the best bargains.
sentences.chinese: 那些年歲尚可，行程低的舊車纔是最好的選擇。

sentences.english: One such instance of dishonesty might be argued to be the result of reckless impulse.
sentences.chinese: 這種瀆職行爲如屬一次偶犯尚可推諉於一時的衝動。

sentences.english: Don’t look now, but the good times may have just stopped rolling.
sentences.chinese: 別看現在形勢尚可，但好時代可能已經停止它的運轉。

sentences.english: Island composite wire prices remained stable, sales can.
sentences.chinese: 海島複合絲價格行情保持平穩，市場銷量尚可。

sentences.english: Neither better nor worse, just a breathing body.
sentences.chinese: 不好不壞，只是一個尚可呼吸的軀體。

sentences.english: Space-time maps indeed clearly showed the dispersion of repolarization among neighboring leads, and the distribution of U wave.
sentences.chinese: 時空圖尚可展示相鄰部位的復極離散和U波分佈。

sentences.english: The peripheral circulation of the right foot is ok.

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
conforming with the norms of society
